vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.27.10;
son of: Hezron (H2696H);
brother of: Ram (H7410), Caleb (H3612H), Segub (H7687H) and Ashhur (H0806); married to Atarah (H5851);
father of: Ram (H7410H), Bunah (H0946), Oren (H0767), Ozem (H0684H), Ahijah (H0281J) and Onam (H0208H)
Also named: ye.rach.me.e.li (יְרַחְמְאֵלִי "Jerahmeelite" H3397)
§ Jerahmeel = "may God have pity"
1) the 1st son of Hezron, grandson of Pharez, and great grandson of Judah and the founder of the family of Jerahmeelites
2) officer sent by king Jehoiakim of Judah to arrest Baruch
3) a Merarite Levite the representative of the family of Kish, the son of Mahli
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Hesrón; tribu de Judá; (b)   hijo de Quis; tribu de Leví; (c)   hijo de Joaquim, rey de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶拉篾 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "願神憐憫"
1) 希斯崙的長子, 法勒斯的孫子, 猶大的曾孫; 耶拉蔑家族的建立者 ( #代上 2:25| )
2) 猶大王約雅敬的臣子, 他被王派去捉拿巴錄 ( #耶36:26| )
3) 米拉利的利未人, 利抹的兒子, 他是基士家族的代表 ( #代上 24:29)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶拉篾 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "愿神怜悯"
1) 希斯仑的长子, 法勒斯的孙子, 犹大的曾孙; 耶拉蔑家族的建立者 ( #代上 2:25| )
2) 犹大王约雅敬的臣子, 他被王派去捉拿巴录 ( #耶36:26| )
3) 米拉利的利未人, 利抹的儿子, 他是基士家族的代表 ( #代上 24:29)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.29;
son of: Kish (H7027H)
§ Jerahmeel = "may God have pity"
1) the 1st son of Hezron, grandson of Pharez, and great grandson of Judah and the founder of the family of Jerahmeelites
2) officer sent by king Jehoiakim of Judah to arrest Baruch
3) a Merarite Levite the representative of the family of Kish, the son of Mahli

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Jer.36.26;
son of: Hammelech (H4428H);
brother of: Malchijah (H4441H)
§ Jerahmeel = "may God have pity"
1) the 1st son of Hezron, grandson of Pharez, and great grandson of Judah and the founder of the family of Jerahmeelites
2) officer sent by king Jehoiakim of Judah to arrest Baruch
3) a Merarite Levite the representative of the family of Kish, the son of Mahli
